metadata.creator: Office of the President
metadata.description: This volume, "The Rebuilder" focuses on President Aquino as crisis manager who utilized her insight into human character to full advantage; as in the case of her designating the key people who successfully orchestrated the massive reconstruction and rehabilitation work necessitated by the 1990 killer quake that struck Luzon. This volume also relates how the President's men used the fast track approach to infrastructure projects.
metadata.subject: Corazon C. Aquino
metadata.title: The Aquino Management Of The Presidency The Rebuilder
